V

Validatable - Interface in com.ndi
An interface for all objects capable of validating a JSON Instance against a JSON Schema.
Validatable.Util - Class in com.ndi
An inner class that contains methods all the subclasses that implement this interface might use.
validate(String) - Method in class com.ndi.EnumFormatValidator
Perform the validation of the JSON instance.
validateEnumFormatValidatorJSON(JSONObject) - Static method in class com.ndi.EnumFormatValidator
Validate the input JSONObject file using the com.ndi.Validator class.
Validator - Class in com.ndi
A wrapper class around com.ndi.Everit's json-schema validator implementation: 'https://github.com/everit-org/json-schema', which follows the Draft v7 specification
Validator(String, String) - Constructor for class com.ndi.Validator
Initialize an instance of Validator by passing in string which is the content of the JSON document and JSON schema document
Validator(JSONObject, JSONObject) - Constructor for class com.ndi.Validator
Initialize an instance of Validator by passing in instance of JSONObject
